document_data.name: ''Liahona''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''liahona''''' was an intelligent brass [[orb]] that served as a [[compass]] and as an oracle.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|126}}
document_data.Description: A ''liahona'' resembled a brass ball of curious and intrincate design.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|125}}
document_data.Powers: The brass orb would react only to [[lawful good|lawfully good]] aligned characters. It could convey the direction of true north. Once per day, it could call on a [[locate object]] spell, and once per week it could answer a yes/no question.
